Package it.polimi.se2018.networking.server

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RmiServerInterface
    The remote interface for the RMI communication.
    ServerNetInterface
    The interface that contains the common features of the different servers.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultNetInterface
    This class represents the default behaviour of servers.
    DelegateNetInterface
    This class is used by sub-servers to delegate the master server.
    DisconnectedViewsRepository
    Singleton class that keeps track of disconnected views.
    HybridServer
    This is a server that runs over other servers.
    RmiServer  
    RmiServerImplementation
    The RMI server implementation, which extends UnicastRemoteObject, for the RMI schema.
    Server
    Abstract base class for servers.
    TcpGatherer
    This class' task is to handle connections: it adds new clients to the server creating VirtualTcpClient that are immediately started only if a thread in threadPool is idle (otherwise is queued) to be ready to handle messages received through the socket.
    TcpServer
    This class implements the server functionality to handle socket connections.
    VirtualRmiClient
    The class that simulates the client on the server.
    VirtualTcpClient
    This class represents a Client on the server side (it implements ClientNetInterface): it is the access point to client on the server.
